Good morning Kristin,
Enjoyed the session last night, a kind of noisy one, =
regret leaving   
Deborah (the spirit lady) left, I hope she crossed over, =
I heard someone  crying 
but, it sounded more like the other lady on the li=
ne.  It's not easy  to 
hear them over there, they talk so fast, what was t=
he number of  the RS that 
was being discontinued?  They were talking about=
 it last  night, I didn't get 
the number, this is a small town area, so ou=
r RS might still  have them, at 
least for awhile. Tks. sf 
 
 
In a messag=
e dated 5/22/2009 8:15:18 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
ckmorris95@sbcgloba=
l.net writes:

 
 



Hi Delta.  Welcome.  I just replied to Shane answerin=
g very similar  
questions.  I think it should answer your questions too.  =
J
